<title level="1" right="Trait">[Wraith](/Traits.aspx?ID=780)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 364 <sup>1.1</sup>

A wraith is an incorporeal undead creature infused with void energy and driven by a hatred of all life.
name: Wraith
